body: This is handled by a combination of uptake and enrollment telemetry, but we don't expose this data within Normandy's admin interface. I think that exposing this data is well handled by other tools, such as Test Tube and Experiments Viewer.
body_text: This is handled by a combination of uptake and enrollment telemetry, but we don't expose this data within Normandy's admin interface. I think that exposing this data is well handled by other tools, such as Test Tube and Experiments Viewer.
